page.title: 02Industry in Inverkeithing
page.content:
Near the inner part of{Inverkeithing {Bay}there is situated a paper mill. This paper mill is owned by{GP {Inveresk}and makes paper for commercial purposes. This mill is a major employer in the area, along with the electronics companies in{Hillend {Industrial Estate,}and is probably the largest factory in{Inverkeithing (not including Belleknowes Industrial Estate)
In the{Belleknowes Estate}there are many units{TO LET}for companies who wish to hire a factory or warehouse for a short or long period.
